items: Added new dark mode support across all dashboard components
Implemented real-time collaboration features in document editor
Introduced customizable keyboard shortcuts
Fixed memory leak in WebSocket connection handler
Resolved issue with date picker in Safari browsers
Corrected timezone handling for international users
Optimized image loading with new lazy loading strategy
Reduced initial bundle size by 35%
Updated dependencies to address potential security vulnerabilities
Enhanced password hashing algorithm
Fixed crash when handling malformed API responses
Resolved authentication token refresh issues
Migrated to new API version 2.0
Updated minimum Node.js requirement to v18
Complete redesign of the user interface
Added support for multiple workspaces
Introduced new analytics dashboard
Enhanced error messages across the application
Improved documentation with interactive examples
Updated onboarding flow with guided tutorials
